query:
ALTER TABLE campaigns 
ADD COLUMN battlesPerPhase int NOT NULL DEFAULT 3,
ADD COLUMN strategicPointsForVictory int NOT NULL DEFAULT 10,
ADD COLUMN currentNarrativeObjective varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'establishing_the_front',
ADD COLUMN phase1Result ENUM('success', 'failure', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN phase2Result ENUM('success', 'failure', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN phase3Result ENUM('success', 'failure', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN phase4Result ENUM('success', 'failure', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending';
